title: ASP.NET Core On Linux - How To Tame a Penguin
sessionTitle: ASP.NET Core On Linux - How To Tame a Penguin
eventShortDescription: ​"Microsoft Heart Linux" is a big statement backed up by exciting software releases that give the .NET developer more choices than ever before. But how to get started? Brendan is a former Linux fundamentalist turned .NET Developer, and this talk will teach some essential Linux command-line basics before going on to deploy a .NET web application.
